docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Mkdocs部署到服务器
docs.text:
mkdocs部署到服务器

👀参考

  • 服务器外网多人访问，ubuntu20.04，ssh，nps内网穿透
  • 用mkdocs+nginx搭建个人网站

docs.title: 服务器安装和配置nps
docs.text:
🧐安装

wget https://github.com/ehang-io/nps/releases/download/v0.26.10/linux_amd64_server.tar.gz

tar -zxvf linux_amd64_server.tar.gz

./nps install

nps start

🧐配置

cd /etc/nps

vim nps.conf

nps stop
nps start

docs.title: 常规使用
docs.text:
1. 创建工程：mkdocs new project_name
  2. 运行：mkdocs serve
  3. md文件的第一行留空，第二行输入---，这样mkdocs标题可显示为文件名

docs.title: 实现中文搜索
docs.text:
1. 安装mkdocs-materials：pip install mkdocs-material
  2. 在yml文件加上如下配置：
theme:
  name: material
  navigation_depth: 10

plugins:
    - search:
        lang:
            - en
            - ja
        separator: '[\s\-\.]+'
